headline.main: Obama Tries to Kick the Habit

docs.abstract: Sure, he quit smoking. But what about the gum?
docs.lead_paragraph: Senator Barack Obama is using nicotine gum to help him quit smoking. Now the question is, can he quit the gum?
docs.snippet: Sure, he quit smoking. But what about the gum?
